title: GreatArkansas
author: GreatArkansas
content: Since airdrops started to become trending nowadays. For example, you will get free tokens from the different projects while just participating in any activities on their platform, just like recently what happened to the Arbitrum network.I want to see a list of them with different information like how much the price started to trade when they airdropped the tokens, how much has already increased since the airdrop of the price, etc.I tried to google, but I can't find any, maybe I'm using the wrong keywords  .Any idea? Like website/platform that got information like these?

comments.author: FrozenBit
comments.body: I'm not sure if that's it, but it's also one of the websites that update the airdrop information and see the profits afterwards.https://airdropalert.com/There are many similar ones but I don't remember exactly which one, but I see some social channels they also often repeat this. Twitter, tg, DC, ... is the place of strong activity of market airdrop search groups, you can start with the keyword airdrop on twitter to search for results, hope it is useful to you.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: GreatArkansas on March 30, 2023, 02:38:33 AMI want to see a list of them with different information like how much the price started to trade when they airdropped the tokens, how much has already increased since the airdrop of the price, etc.Can't we use Coinmarketcap or Coingecko as a reference? LOL. I don't think we have a single platform that provides specific information regarding airdrops, but if you want to find out potential airdrops, you can use the website mentioned by @FrozenBit above, or at Airdrops.io. But for Airdrops like Arbitrum, you won't get any information, because usually their airdrops are not accompanied by an initial announcement.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Quote from: GreatArkansas on March 30, 2023, 02:38:33 AMAny idea? Like website/platform that got information like these?Not sure if this website will match what you are looking for https://earni.fi/learnhere you can learn about some of the airdrops that have been carried out and if I'm not mistaken, if we register, we will get some kind of notification if there is a possibility of a new airdrop, because knowing the upcoming airdrop is also quite important because I'm sure many are left behind with good news like that, and there you can also check our crypto address which might get an airdrop but we don't know about it.

comments.author: StarKay
comments.body: I don't know of any site that offers the service you are looking for but I think anyone can manually check for this information on CMC, Coingecko, or any other crypto price checking website although it will require more effort. I think you need the data to know if airdrop really pays enough to be able to invest your time and in some cases money to participate.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: GreatArkansas on March 30, 2023, 02:38:33 AMSince airdrops started to become trending nowadays. For example, you will get free tokens from the different projects while just participating in any activities on their platform, just like recently what happened to the Arbitrum network.I want to see a list of them with different information like how much the price started to trade when they airdropped the tokens, how much has already increased since the airdrop of the price, etc.I tried to google, but I can't find any, maybe I'm using the wrong keywords  .Any idea? Like website/platform that got information like these?I am personally not an airdrop hunter and even though i knew that there might be a possible arbitrum airdrop and that most likely the people would get an airdrop that were using the arbitrum blockchain before a certain deadline i did not do any trades or swaps on Arbitrum and therefore i obviously also did not get any Arb tokens.Still i know a few twitter channels that are providing lists of possible airdrops and even instructions on what to do and sometimes even video tutorials how to do it. At the moment it seems like zksync is the next big target for airdrop farmers, but to be honest i don't think that this airdrop will have a value that is even close to the one of Arb, because there are just too many airdrop hunters now.Link to the channel: https://twitter.com/CryptoStreamHub

comments.author: Bobrox
comments.body: Personally in my country Indonesia have many telegram channel update about new airdrop like arbitrum and many kinds other airdrop participant with free without fund or have preparing fees for swap like arbitrum. I don't think you are ready with airdrop like arbitrum indeed need waiting for longer time and they not update will sent airdrop coins for user have active swap or trade on their platform.I don't have enough fees for participating on airdrop like arbitrum, not only about longer time distribution but also many kinds or swap or add liquidity airdrop not worth yet due they not launching their coin. Have some airdrop like Elitswap for user active swap on their platform but now worth with price drop and higher than fees for claiming this coins. Based on your lucky and need to participants for all airdrop kinds if you want earn one potential airdrop later.

comments.author: ifarted
comments.body: If I want to know airdrops is I only do a search in google and whatever result Is what I would use to check and also searching if the project is legit. What I found when I search a website with list of airdrops are https://airdropking.io/en/ and https://airdrops.io/ or whatever showed in the results.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: This could be a good list, in addition if there’s a site that will share a potential airdrop from a new project, this could be a good one but I doubt on this since airdrop is only meant to those who are working hard to find it and willing to take the risk even if there’s no assurance for the airdrop. In my place there’s a group in social media where you can see a lot of infos about airdrop task, this is a big help for me.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: GreatArkansas on March 30, 2023, 02:38:33 AMSince airdrops started to become trending nowadays. For example, you will get free tokens from the different projects while just participating in any activities on their platform, just like recently what happened to the Arbitrum network.I want to see a list of them with different information like how much the price started to trade when they airdropped the tokens, how much has already increased since the airdrop of the price, etc.I tried to google, but I can't find any, maybe I'm using the wrong keywords  .Any idea? Like website/platform that got information like these?There is really none there are airdrop alerts but it only alerts airdrop with no features to follow if the coin got listed and what's the price, that's all there is alert you to hundreds of airdrops that you can participate in, and it's not really airdrop at all because you need to do a task mostly bounties like task and there's no guaranty that you are going to get a coin because you still have to win in their draw, it's like they will pick 10 out 1000 participants to receive their useless token.So if you're still active on airdrops you're just fooling yourself it's a total waste of time and effort.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: crzy on March 30, 2023, 09:08:29 PMThis could be a good list, in addition if there’s a site that will share a potential airdrop from a new project, this could be a good one but I doubt on this since airdrop is only meant to those who are working hard to find it and willing to take the risk even if there’s no assurance for the airdrop. In my place there’s a group in social media where you can see a lot of info about airdrop tasks, this is a big help for me. The question is, is it worth it to build such a site that provides airdrop information because most of those airdrop project teams never distribute to members and even if they do what will be the possible percentage that the token will get listed and at what price? -A few tokens that pay airdrop participants have not been really profitable because some of the coins when listed could not gain value not even to pay for transaction fees, so how do you expect airdrop participants to test the project platform when the airdrop reward can even pay fees.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: ifarted on March 30, 2023, 07:59:47 PMIf I want to know airdrops is I only do a search in google and whatever result Is what I would use to check and also searching if the project is legit. What I found when I search a website with list of airdrops are https://airdropking.io/en/ and https://airdrops.io/ or whatever showed in the results.If those sites shares only a good potential airdrop then its ok to try, but it is still advisable to do your own research and look for a project that might give you an airdrop. Huge airdrop is one of a kind, if you’re luck enough you might qualify for this but better not to expect that much in airdrop. Stay consistent on looking for a good airdrop, there might be no assurance but there’s a chance for you to get money here so keep working.

comments.author: Bay_Harbour_Butcher
comments.body: I usually monitor and track airdrops via https://airdropking.io/en/, or from coinmarketcap, but now I very rarely do that, because I think this is just a waste of time, most of the coins from airdrops end up being dead coins

comments.author: fvb
comments.body: I don't know of a platform that would talk about all the upcoming airdrops. Because I rarely do it and only those that are really promising projects. Mostly these are unknown companies that do not bring any benefit to the community.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: I'm also looking for a good airdrop tracker or some kind of airdrop focused website or app that has some directory of past, current and speculated airdrops. This is a good project idea for someone who is a developer that want to develop an app or website. I wish that someone will make an application that has a tracker, directory, airdrop community voting or has an information of how to get eligible for the airdrop. I'm sure that the utility of the app is usable for many people. This can be a All in one application that can be surely be monetized!

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Quote from: abel1337 on April 06, 2023, 07:32:37 PMI'm also looking for a good airdrop tracker or some kind of airdrop focused website or app that has some directory of past, current and speculated airdrops. This is a good project idea for someone who is a developer that want to develop an app or website. I wish that someone will make an application that has a tracker, directory, airdrop community voting or has an information of how to get eligible for the airdrop. I'm sure that the utility of the app is usable for many people. This can be a All in one application that can be surely be monetized! Above there are some sites that provide about airdrop tracking why not use that? Even I'm not sure there is an app with an airdrop tracker because it is random for us unknown.Actually there are many who provide this, such as telegram channels, twitter, discord just need to analyze whether the airdrop is potential or not because we don't know, recently it was about ardrop that did a bridge that has great value maybe you can also try it even on twitter there has been a lot of influence doing this how to enter for the airdrop criteria.Airdrops are volatile, so don't get your hopes up.

comments.author: lobo13hf
comments.body: many of the airdrop tracker honestly only have listings of some outdated airdrop, if it's new they'd definitely never gets listed, so I guess it's better joining telegram that has info about these airdrops instead, because even though we need to check manually at least they've got the latest information.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: There are a few different places. You can use Twitter even and just search for Airdrops and you can see which one is getting a lot of hype. Keep in mind you might run into scams so be careful.Usually try and go with potentials airdrops if they had completed a few funding rounds and they have a high valuation. Then you know it’ll be worth doing since they had millions invested in the project.

comments.author: I_RodimusPrime
comments.body: Quote from: GreatArkansas on March 30, 2023, 02:38:33 AMSince airdrops started to become trending nowadays. For example, you will get free tokens from the different projects while just participating in any activities on their platform, just like recently what happened to the Arbitrum network.I want to see a list of them with different information like how much the price started to trade when they airdropped the tokens, how much has already increased since the airdrop of the price, etc.I tried to google, but I can't find any, maybe I'm using the wrong keywords  .Any idea? Like website/platform that got information like these?I was also searched once and honestly there is no website to provide that kind of information. Most reply's here showing one of their telegram channel/twitter  . There are lot of website that provide information like how much get if you are winner, total airdrop pool and etc...But if you want to get recent updates after airdrop then try the Alpha insiders, Olimpio Alpha. Those guys have some premium memberships in their discord channels and they always update about the projects. Give it a try, you will be charged 7-8$ monthly and also they organize membership giveaways sometimes.

comments.author: raidarksword
comments.body: airdropalert and aidrops.io would be first come to my mind regard to that matter. Airdrops now are different from the past we had compared to what we have right now which more complicated and more technical stuff. Though there are many guides from twitter that can be handy for all new from testnet/airdrop stuff.
